title: What major events do you expect to take place in 2020, besides COVID-19, BLM protests, and elections? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hurricanes, tornados floods, forest fires, drought, mass shootings, kidnapping, murder. Meat, corn and grain shortages, unemployment, hunger. Had enough? Don’t we have enough pain and suffering on our collective plates now. Can’t we have just a little peace and love once and awhile? Seriously, is that too much to ask? How about going out your door, look at the sky and say thank you for all I have. It’s great to be alive.
